name: Farmula Grain Prix
description:
Didn't have time to make an in game tutorial so here are some tips to help out!

CONTROL OPTIONS:

  • WASD =  W=Gas A/D=Turn Space=Nitro S=Brake
  • ARROWS = Left/Right=Turn  Up/Z=Gas Down=Brake X=Nitro C=Brake  
  • MOUSE= Left/Gas    Right/Nitro

Mouse to interact with menus & place buildings
(I didn't have time to add non mouse control options for menus/buildings but plan to!)

ESC= to exit pit menu (or go button)

R = for quick restart if you get stuck

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Use the pit stop to change your tractor purchase buildings
  • Harvest the race track by plowing, seeding, watering and after a couple laps harvesting fully grown crops
  • You can sell your crops at the pit stop market to buy upgrades to your race track
  • The crop market fluctuates, so if you wait for a good price you can make a lot more!

Sorry for any bugs you may encounter -this was made in a crazy hurry for LD JAM

Art, music, programming and game design by Chase of Bass made for ld jam 52  - Theme: Harvest
